name: reset_stopwatch
description: Reset the stopwatch to its initial state.

name: record_lap
description: Record a lap time in the stopwatch.

name: open_more_options
description: Open additional options related to the stopwatch.

name: switch_tab
description: Switch to a different tab (e.g., Alarm, Clock, Timer, Bedtime).
parameters: {'tab_name': "Which tab do you want to switch to? ['Alarm', 'Clock', 'Timer', 'Bedtime']"}

name: open_file_manager
description: Open the file manager application to navigate and manage files on the Android device.
